generatedSources.name: #utility.yul

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: STATE variables
@notice modifier to check if the caller is the owner aka buyer
@notice modifier to check if the caller is the seller of the product
@notice modifier to check if the caller is the shipper of the order
@notice modifier to check if the order is in created state
@notice modifier to check if the order is in verified state
@notice modifier to check if the order is in paid state
@notice modifier to check if the order is in delivered state

@notice Verify the order by the seller (only can be done in created state)
 @param inStock whether the product is in stock

@notice Verify the order by the shipper (only can be done in created state)
 @param rightDestinations whether the delivery points are right
@notice Buyer acknowledges that they have received the order and verify the receipt (only can be done in delivered state)
@notice Buyer/Seller/Shipper could make an emergency cancellation of the order at any time

@notice Get the order status of the order
 @return the order status

@notice Get the status whether the order is verified by the seller
 @return whether the order is verified by the seller

@notice Get the status whether the order is verified by the shipper
 @return whether the order is verified by the shipper

@notice Get the last updated time
 @return the last updated time (in epoch format)

@notice Get the delivery points
 @return the delivery points

@notice Get the delivery point centres' addresses
 @return the delivery point centres' addresses

@notice Get the delivery due times
 @return the delivery due times (in an array with epoch format)

@notice Get the delivery times
 @return the delivery times (in an array with epoch format)

params._oracle: the address of the oracle contract
params._product: the address of the product that is being purchased
params._seller: the address of the seller of the product
params._shipper: the address of the shipper of the order

getCurrentDeliveryPoint().details: if currentDeliveryPoint is 0, then it is the first delivery point      else it is the last delivery point which is updated

returns._0: the current delivery point (in string format)
the delivery due times (in an array with epoch format)
the delivery times (in an array with epoch format)
whether the order is verified by the seller
whether the order is verified by the shipper
the last updated time (in epoch format)

isPaid().details: call the oracle contract to check if the order is paid

params.inStock: whether the product is in stock

params.rightDestinations: whether the delivery points are right

ShipmentUpdated(uint256,string).notice: event emitted when the order is updated by the delivery point centres

cancelOrder().notice: Buyer/Seller/Shipper could make an emergency cancellation of the order at any time

getIntermediaries().notice: Get the delivery point centres' addresses

getIsVerifiedBySeller().notice: Get the status whether the order is verified by the seller

getIsVerifiedByShipper().notice: Get the status whether the order is verified by the shipper

getOrderStatus().notice: Get the order status of the order

isPaid().notice: Check if the order is paid by the buyer (only can be done in verified state)

updateShipment(uint256).notice: Update the shipment by the delivery point centres (only can be done in paid state)         Only can be called the delivery point centres' addresses

verifyOrderBySeller(bool).notice: Verify the order by the seller (only can be done in created state)

verifyOrderByShipper(bool).notice: Verify the order by the shipper (only can be done in created state)

verifyReceipt().notice: Buyer acknowledges that they have received the order and verify the receipt (only can be done in delivered state)

userdoc.notice: Here is the flow to use this contract: 1. Buyer creates an order 2. Seller and Shipper verifies the order (order does not matter) 3. Check if the order is paid by the buyer by verifying with the oracle contract 4. The intermediaries update the shipment 5. Buyer verifies the receipt Note that Buyer, Seller, Shipper can cancels the order at any time
